code: import React from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./BookCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookCard=props=>{const Navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.image,alt:"book pic missing",className:"card-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{className:"card-title",children:["Title: ",props.title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("i",{className:"card-author",children:["Author: ",props.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-published",children:["Published: ",props.published]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"card-btn",onClick:()=>{Navigate("/dashboard/:".concat(props.id),{replace:true});},children:"Learn more"})]})]});};export default BookCard;
